name: 第一語言習得
goals: To enhance Ss’s concepts about first language acquisition
To guide Ss to conduct an independent study on first language acquisition
syllabus:
**I. Goal:**

The ultimate goal of this course is to discuss with students some important issues in Language Acquisition. By the end of the term, students are supposed to provide empirical arguments to support what they learn in class.

**II. Requirements:**

1\. Attendance is required for this class. Absence without a proper excuse may result in failing this course.

2\. This course has several oral presentations and quizzes.

3\. A research project is required for this course towards the end of the semester.

4\. Grading Policy:

    (1) Quizzes ---------------------------------------------------------- 20%

    (2) Research Project ------------------------------------------------ 50%

    (3) Oral Presentations ---------------------------------------------- 30%

methodologies.note: T will elaborate further on the concepts presented by Ss, when necessary.
T and Ss will explore the issues related to different issues in first language acquisition.
T will assign Ss to present given book chapters and journal papers individually and in pairs.
T will guide Ss to work on their research design for their empirical study due by the end of the semester.
T will ask Ss to do oral presentations with PowerPoint files and videos.
T will discuss with each student about his/her term paper.

grading.note: A term paper is due by the end of the semester.
